summary: Flappy Bird game with progressive difficulty - bird speed increases over time

existing_features.title: Implement progressive speed increase mechanism where the bird's vertical velocity increases gradually as gameplay time progresses, making the game harder over time
Add visual feedback to indicate speed level changes, such as a speed multiplier indicator or subtle UI notification when speed increases
Configure production deployment with the domain name 'flappy-birds2025'

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement progressive bird speed increase during gameplay
